summary: This bill, the Sloan Canyon Conservation and Lateral Pipeline Act, amends the Sloan Canyon National Conservation Area Act. It adjusts the conservation area boundary by updating the relevant map and increasing the designated acreage. Furthermore, it grants the Southern Nevada Water Authority rights-of-way for a water pipeline, including the ability to excavate and dispose of materials, while setting specific requirements to protect conservation area resources. The bill also clarifies management of the conservation area concerning utility corridors and rights-of-way.
